name: Food Panic
description:
Combine your favorite dishes to fill the food bar and don't let the panic get into you! Make combos from three to five so as to achieve the ramen and burger specials, and use them to burst the gauge!!

What did you say? Rain? OMG!! It's raining food! Out of nowhere you will have tons of dishes falling to you, get them with the basket before they go to waste!
